## IMarketplace.acceptWinningBid() method

Accepts the winning bid for an auction and closes the listing, resulting in the sale of the tokens to the buyer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
acceptWinningBid(listingId: BigNumberish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listingId | BigNumberish | The listing id. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
